function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clarity in the application of sick leave policies for construction workers, especially those paid on a daily basis","Impact":"Inconsistent application of sick leave policies leading to potential spread of contagious diseases among construction workers","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines on how sick leave should be applied to workers paid on a daily basis, and enforce consistent implementation across construction companies","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Construction workers, small construction companies","Owner":"Government, construction industry associations"},{"Description":"Exclusion of construction workers from the formal economy from sick leave benefits, leading to vulnerability during disease outbreaks","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of construction workers to contagious diseases and economic hardship","Mitigation":"Create support programs specifically for construction workers in the informal economy, offer financial incentives for compliance with sick leave policies","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Construction workers in the informal economy, government","Owner":"Government, construction industry associations"},{"Description":"Risk of increased disease transmission due to shared housing arrangements for construction workers","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission among construction workers living in shared housing, leading to potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Revise housing arrangements to ensure single occupancy, provide isolation facilities for symptomatic workers, implement regular testing and health checks","Technologies":"Isolation facilities, testing equipment","People":"Construction workers, construction companies","Owner":"Construction companies, government"}]}
